song_name: Come So Far (Got So Far To Go)
artist_names: Elijah Kelley, Zac Efron, Queen Latifah, Nikki Blonsky, Motion Picture Cast of Hairspray
lyrics:
11 contributorscome so far got so far to go ”hairspray” lyricsverse 1 zac efron nikki blonsky  elijah kelly
hey old friend lets look back on the crazy clothes we wore
aint it fun to look back and to see its all been done before
all those nights together are a special memory
and i cant wait for tomorrow just as long as youre dancing next to me

prechorus nikki blonsky  queen latifah elijah kelly nikki blonksy
cause its so clear every year we get stronger stronger
whats gone is gone the past is the past
turn the radio up and then hit the gas cause

chorus all
i know weve come so far but weve got so far to go ooo
i know the road seems long but it wont be long til its time to go

oh yeah hey yeah oh oh

verse 1 zac efron nikki blonsky elijah kelly queen latifah
hey old friend together sidebyside and yearbyyear
the road was filled with twists and turns oh but thats the road that got us here
lets move past the bad times but before those memories fade
lets forgive but not forget and learn from the mistakes we made

prechorus nikki blonsky  queen latifah elijah kelly
cause its so clear every year we get stronger stronger
so dont give up and dont say when
and just get back on the road again cause

but its so much better than where ive been

just keep movin at your own speed
your heart is all the compass youll ever need so you need
lets keep cruisin the road were on
cause the rearview mirror only shows whats gone gone gone yeah
we got so far to go
woah oh yeah
